Title: Relates to disqualification from receiving unemployment benefits when the claimant's employer maintained, refused or failed to cure a health or safety condition that made the environment unsuitable
Summary: Relates to disqualification from receiving benefits for separation from employment in cases where the claimant's employer maintained or refused to cure  a health or safety condition that made the environment unsuitable.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to disqualification from receiving benefits for separation from employment in cases where the claimant's employer maintained or refused or failed to cure a health or safety condition that made the environment unsuitable
